author: William Worrall
title: Pokemon Go Is Making Money the Right Way During this Pandemic
description: Pokemon Go has just seen a massive spike in revenue despite the coronavirus, all without having to put their players or staff in danger. Companies like GameStop could learn a thing or two here. The post Pokemon Go Is Making Money the Right Way During this Pan…
content:
• Niantics Pokemon Go has seen a considerable revenue spike despite the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.
  • This is mostly thanks to Niantic carefully changing the game to make at-home playing of the game viable.
